mn3:2.4: Text’s _ādiya_ (and variant _ādissā_) are future passive participles from √_dis_ (“point”) having the sense “liable to be pointed out or accused”.
mn3:3.2: BB has left-over, which is a little misleading. Normally I’d use that for sesa. But here it is not necessarily the leftovers from the bowl. More likely, since, additional food has been refused, it is extra food in the offering dishes.
